text: == Births == * January 24 – Richard Aungerville, English writer and bishop (died 1345) * April 25 – Roger Mortimer, 1st Earl of March, de facto ruler of England (died 1330) * Robert III of Artois == Deaths == * April 3 – Pope Honorius IV * August 31 – Konrad von Würzburg, German poet * October 19 – Bohemund VII of Tripoli * Llywelyn ap Dafydd, a Welsh prince, in his prison at Bristol Castle * Hu Sansheng, Chinese historian (born 1230)
